1100111100100011 1010010110100001 1 -> sum: 0111010011000101, cout: 1
0101011100010011 0100001100111000 1 -> sum: 1001101001001100, cout: 0
0111100000010001 0011000001001011 0 -> sum: 1010100001011100, cout: 0
1101111011000000 0111111110010001 1 -> sum: 0101111001010010, cout: 1
0000100010010101 0011111010111110 1 -> sum: 0100011101010100, cout: 0
1101110110000110 1010000001101001 1 -> sum: 0111110111110000, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
